EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
M/V CV30 REPORTS CREWMAN REQUIRING
MEDICAL ASSISTANCE IN 39-15.72S 004-03.07W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE REQUESTED TO ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC CAPE TOWN,
EMAIL: MARITIMERADIO@TELKOM.CO.ZA,
MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA.
